content: SJD 6 DRS Jig saw dust collector On-board dust removal system for the SJD 6-22 cordless jig saw ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > On-board dust removal systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded maneuverability – on-board, hose-free sawdust removal, giving you better control while cutting with jig saws Outsized performance – sawdust removal rates comparable to those of full-size vacuum cleaners Automatic activation – dust suction starts as soon as you start the jig saw Cleaner, safer workplace – fine wood dust is collected before it can become airborne Applications Minimizing airborne dust while cutting wood or drywall to size Interior finishing – collecting sawdust while trimming internal cladding Outdoor wood cutting – virtually dust-free cutting where no power outlet is available ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Dust removal systems For use with: n/a Technical Data | Accessory type | Dust removal systems | For use with | n/a ### ITEMS- 2298509 - Dust removal system SJD 6 DRS - Package Size 1 pc
